name: Social Space (JohnVenters, EDFreeman, Ray, FeiYeung, MichaelFalcone)
name_original: Social Space (JohnVenters, EDFreeman, Ray, FeiYeung, MichaelFalcone)
description:
Social Space is a 3D, stylized, casual game that teaches players how to practice safe social distancing while maintaining healthy relationships. You play as a young adult who visits the market each day to socialize and help the people who live and work there. Balancing the player and NPCs’ happiness levels with the risk of getting COVID-19, you must spend your limited time each day wisely to ensure the player makes it home happy and safe without contracting or spreading COVID.

Please Note: This is a vertical slice, not a full game. Only two NPCs are implemented with tasks you can complete.
